parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns state of given action in the [[Eden Editor]].
<br><br>
See the [[Eden_Editor:_Actions|list of all actions]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''get3DENActionState''' action
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> action: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[get3DENActionState]] "ToggleMap" == 1) [[then]] {[[systemChat]] "Editor map is open!"};</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>  
[[do3DENAction]] 
</value></part></template></root>
